Summary: like the one in close encounters
divs: Sighting Detailssame as above I awoke to the feeling I was visited. jumped up to look out the window to se a glimpse of the craft moving away down the street. My son had also been coming to the side of my bed bedause of the "Imgonnagitcha" which I would say to him at play. However, now I see a possible pattern of him being scared and my losing time.
